SKU630533.Name: Snoozer Charcoal Glider
SKU630533.Description: Our Snoozer Blue Glider designed by Leanne Ford brings comfort and cool factor into the nursery, adding a bold look as well as a cozy spot to rock your little one to sleep. Conceived in the round, the chair envelops with rounded arms, plush upholstery and exaggeratedly deep channels that create a playful stacked look. The family-friendly denim offers practicality and durability in an elevated color story, contrasting beautifully with the honey-hued wooden base. To complete your snuggly spot for reading, feeding and singing lullabies, add the coordinating storage ottoman.Star designer and mom Leanne Ford brought her cool, casual style to our new collection for kids (and parents) who love to create, play and make magic together.
Features: Designed by Leanne Ford
Solid pine and low-emission engineered wood with protective clear lacquer
100% polyester denim fabric
Wood base with metal glide mechanism
Family-friendly fabric
Imported

SKU630517.Name: Snoozer Charcoal Storage Ottoman
SKU630517.Description: Store favorite toys and beloved blankies in style with this storage ottoman designed by Leanne Ford. Crafted with exaggeratedly deep channels for a playful stacked look, the versatile piece offers extra seating, hidden storage and a place to rest tired feet. Upholstered in family-friendly denim, the ottoman opens easily with a lift-off top. To create a snuggly spot for reading, feeding and rocking to sleep, pair the Snoozer Blue Storage Ottoman with the coordinating glider.Star designer and mom Leanne Ford brought her cool, casual style to our new collection for kids (and parents) who love to create, play and make magic together.
Features: Designed by Leanne Ford
Low-emission engineered wood
Polyester denim fabric
Family-friendly fabric
Top lifts off
Ottoman does not glide
Imported

SKU568277.Name: Payton Black and Natural Cane Rocker
SKU568277.Description: Our Cane Rocker will stand out in your nursery today, and become your go-to family room seating in years to come. In fact, the elevated, mixed material design is chic enough to totally shine in shared areas of the home where grown-ups and kids hang out. Red oak construction combines with a breezy, open weave back to create a statement-making style. Plus, the compact design fits in just about anywhere—tiny nurseries included.

Dimentions.productName: Payton Black and Natural Cane Rocker

Features: Mixed material rocking chair
Ash, low emission engineered wood and rope weave
100% polyester fabric
Imported

SKU585126.Name: Babyletto Kiwi Ivory Power Recliner Glider
SKU585126.Description: Give your nursery a touch of sleek style, comfort, and even some peace and quiet with the Kiwi Ivory Linen Electronic Recliner and Swivel Glider. A hidden control panel in the armrest features buttons that control reclining, plus a USB port, so you can have electronics conveniently on hand. And it swivels with a smooth gliding motion, so you won't disrupt your little one's sleep while you get comfortable. Made and upholstered by hand, it's the perfect recliner for parents and babies.GREENGUARD Gold Certification

Dimentions.productName: Babyletto Kiwi Ivory Power Recliner Glider

Features: Modern wingback style recliner with hidden push-button control panel and USB charging port
Smooth and quiet reclining mechanism lowers headrest and raises footrest
Swivels 270 degrees and glides back and forth in upright position
Constructed and upholstered by hand
Upholstery is free of chemical flame retardants
Meets all ca tb117-2013 flammability requirements
Free of polybrominated diphenyl ethers (PBDEs) and formaldehyde
